headline: How Offshore Wind Lease Pauses on National Security Grounds Will Impact Dominion Energy (D) Investors
summary: The U.S. Department of the Interior recently paused leases for Dominion Energy’s Coastal Virginia Offshore Wind project, along with four other large East Coast offshore wind developments, citing emerging national security concerns related to radar interference. Dominion Energy has strongly pushed back, arguing the project is essential to powering Virginia’s fast-growing electricity demand from military installations and AI data centers, and warning that prolonged delays could strain grid...
